body.name: Visual Studio Code
body.description: My go-to editor for everything from web development to writing this website. It's super customizable and has tons of extensions to boost my productivity.

body.name: iTerm2
body.description: My favorite terminal emulator on macOS. It provides a powerful and flexible environment for working with the command line.

body.name: Firefox
body.description: My preferred web browser, known for its focus on privacy and security. It offers a smooth browsing experience.

body.name: Raycast
body.description: A launcher that supercharges my workflow. I can quickly access applications, run custom scripts, and perform actions with just a few keystrokes.

body.name: Postman
body.description: An invaluable tool for designing, testing, and documenting APIs.

body.name: httpie
body.description: A fantastic command-line HTTP client that makes interacting with APIs and web services a breeze. It boasts a user-friendly syntax, colorful output, and built-in JSON support, perfect for testing, debugging, and exploring APIs.

body.name: TablePlus
body.description: A user-friendly database management tool that supports a variety of databases.
